articles.content: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India (HMSI) on Monday reported a 45 per cent year-on-year jump in domestic wholesales at 4,50,589 units in May. The company had dispatched 3,11,144 units to its dealers … [+331 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Japan's Toyota hit by testing scandal; automaker apologises - The Economic Times
articles.description: The transport ministry told the companies to stop delivering certain models within Japan after they reported failures to follow standardised steps to certify vehicles for shipment.
articles.content: Toyota said Monday it had suspended domestic shipments of three car models after falling foul of government certification rules along with its Japanese rivals Honda, Mazda, Suzuki and Yamaha.The tran… [+1987 chars]
